background: A jam company needs to determine the minimum number of small and large jars to meet a minimum volume requirement for shipping jam, with a preference for small jars over large ones.

parameters.definition: Volume of jam that a small jar can hold
Volume of jam that a large jar can hold
Minimum total volume of jam needed for shipment

constraints.description: The number of large jars must be non-negative
The number of small jars must be non-negative
The number of large jars does not exceed the number of small jars
constraints.code:
# Ensure the number of large jars does not exceed the number of small jars
model.addConstr(LargeJars <= SmallJars, name="large_jars_leq_small_jars")

constraints.description: Total volume of jam in jars is at least MinimumVolume milliliters
constraints.code:
# Add constraint to ensure the total volume of jam meets the minimum required volume
model.addConstr(SmallJarVolume * SmallJars + LargeJarVolume * LargeJars >= MinimumVolume, name="min_total_volume")

constraints.description: Ensure that the total volume of jam shipped meets or exceeds the MinimumVolume requirement favoring small jars
constraints.code:
# Ensure that the total volume of jam shipped meets or exceeds the minimum requirement
model.addConstr(SmallJarVolume * SmallJars + LargeJarVolume * LargeJars >= MinimumVolume, name="MinimumVolumeRequirement")

variables.definition: The number of large jars needed to meet the minimum volume requirement
The number of small jars needed to meet the minimum volume requirement

objective.description: Minimize the total number of jars used to ship at least MinimumVolume ml of jam
objective.code:
# Define objective function
model.setObjective(LargeJars + SmallJars, gp.GRB.MINIMIZE)
